definition[0]: a narrow piece of attractive cloth that you use, for example, to tie your hair or hold things together
example[0]: little girls with ribbons in their hair
example[1]: a bundle of letters tied with pale blue ribbon
example[2]: The ribbon was cut and the new station was officially open.
definition[1]: a piece of ribbon with a special pattern on it that you wear to show that you have received a military honour
definition[2]: a length of coloured ribbon, sometimes arranged in the form of a flat flower, that is given as a prize in a competition
example[3]: For the second time she won the blue ribbon  (=first prize).
definition[3]: something that is long and narrow
definition[4]: a long narrow piece of cloth or plastic with ink on it that is used in a typewriter
